rules_text:
When Campfire Cooks enters, target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
Decompose into Treasure {1}{R} [i]({1}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Treasure artifact with no mana cost and “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
Changed name, changed art
Elemental —> Ooze
Reworked ability
